title: Empowered Funds LLC Sells 74,358 Shares of Nutanix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NTNX)
content: Empowered Funds LLC trimmed its stake in Nutanix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NTNX – Free Report) by 93.1% in the 4th quarter, HoldingsChannel reports. The firm owned 5,544 shares of the technology company’s stock … [+5016 chars]
